languages.text: {n}Частицы реальности светятся, раскаленные возмутительным насилием над бытием. В их отблеске вы видите миражи Простора Коронус, до неузнаваемости измененного решениями, которые вы приняли... Или не приняли, но могли бы принять в каком-то другом мире.{/n}

{n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Частицы реальности светятся, раскаленные возмутительным насилием над бытием. В их отблеске вы видите миражи Простора Коронус, до неузнаваемости измененного решениями, которые вы приняли... Или не приняли, но могли бы принять в каком-то другом мире.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... Or could have made in a different world.{/n}

{n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... Or could have made in a different world.{/n}

{n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... Or could have made in a different world.{/n}

{n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... Or could have made in a different world.{/n}

{n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

{n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La trame de l'existence est malmenée de façon si flagrante que les particules de la réalité s'embrasent. Leur éclat révèle les mirages des Étendues de Koronus, altérées et rendues méconnaissables par les décisions que vous avez prises... ou qui auraient pu être prises dans un autre monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La trame de l'existence est malmenée de façon si flagrante que les particules de la réalité s'embrasent. Leur éclat révèle les mirages des Étendues de Koronus, altérées et rendues méconnaissables par les décisions que vous avez prises ou auriez pu prendre dans un monde différent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El maltrato del tejido de la existencia hace que la realidad relampaguee a tu alrededor. En su brillo, ves espejismos de la Extensión de Koronus, alterados más allá de todo reconocimiento por tus decisiones... Por las decisiones que podrías haber tomado en otro mundo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El maltrato del tejido de la existencia hace que la realidad relampaguee a tu alrededor. En su brillo, ves espejismos de la Extensión de Koronus, alterados más allá de todo reconocimiento por tus decisiones... Por las decisiones que podrías haber tomado en otro mundo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前的景象严重扭曲了宇宙的结构，现实的微粒在你眼前剧烈闪耀。在这些微粒散发的光芒之中，你看到了科罗努斯扩区的幻影。这些人在过去做出了不同的决定，改变了你所熟知的世界……又或许，那些决定是在另一个世界中做出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的景象严重扭曲了宇宙的结构，现实的微粒在你眼前剧烈闪耀。在这些微粒散发的光芒之中，你看到了科罗努斯扩区的幻影。这些人在过去做出了不同的决定，改变了你所熟知的世界……又或许，那些决定是在另一个世界中做出来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}存在という織物の乱用が、現実の堀を燃え上がらせる。その輝きの中に、コロヌス・エクスパンスの幻像が見える。それは、あなたが下した決断によって、変わってしまった過去…あるいは異なる世界で成し得た可能性。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}存在という織物の乱用が、現実の堀を燃え上がらせる。その輝きの中に、コロヌス・エクスパンスの幻像が見える。それは、あなたが下した決断によって、変わってしまった過去…あるいは異なる世界で成し得た可能性。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der dreiste Missbrauch des Gewebes der Existenz lässt die Partikel der Realität aufflammen. Du siehst die Trugbilder der Koronus-Ausdehnung in ihrem Leuchten, bis zur Unkenntlichkeit verändert durch die Entscheidungen, die du getroffen hast ... oder in einer anderen Welt hättest treffen können.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blatant abuse of the fabric of existence is causing the motes of reality to flare up. You see the mirages of the Koronus Expanse in their glow, altered past recognition by the decisions you have made... or could have made in some other world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der dreiste Missbrauch des Gewebes der Existenz lässt die Partikel der Realität aufflammen. Du siehst die Trugbilder der Koronus-Ausdehnung in ihrem Leuchten, bis zur Unkenntlichkeit verändert durch die Entscheidungen, die du getroffen hast ... Oder in einer anderen Welt hättest treffen können.{/n}
